ComicInfo.Title: Intrusion; Detour; Wormfood; Do Ya Wanna Party?
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tom Skulan passes the editing duties on to Bissette from this issue on.
Credits/ Stories (transcribed directly from contents page):
"INTRUSION" by Michael Dubisch
"DETOUR" by Gary Crutchley and Ben Dilworth
"DO YA WANNA PARTY?" by David Hern and Gurchain Singh
"WORMFOOD" by S.R. Bissette & Rolf Stark
ARTICLES Article Design: Mario Bruni
"INTRUDERS AT THE GATES OF THE MIND- HORROR IN THE UNDERGROUND" PART TWO by Tom Veitch
"PREHISTORIC MONSTER (MAGAZINES)" by Stanley Wiater
FRONT COVER by Bruce Spaulding Fuller
CENTERSPREAD by S.R. Bissette
